item.description:
Laurie has been nice enough to open her home for a games event. She will be hosting a Friday night Meetup in her transformed garage, nicknames Studio 184.

Laurie has some games and darts, but she requests you bring any favorites. People are also welcome to bring food and drinks.

As the Meetup is indoor/outdoor, please dress for the weather (and perhaps be prepared with bug spray).
Parking is available in front of the house, and on side streets: Northend Ave. and Liberty Hill Ave.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night at Studio 184
